ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

BlogBowl is an open-source, self-hosted blogging platform that allows users to quickly launch SEO-optimized blogs, product changelogs, and help documentation without coding. It features a Notion-like editor, built-in newsletter capabilities with Postmark integration, and support for custom domains.

SquirrelDisk is a cross-platform desktop application built with Rust and React (Tauri) for analyzing disk usage. It quickly scans directories or entire disks to identify large files and folders, presenting the information through an intuitive sunburst chart and allowing users to manage files directly.

This Python project facilitates the conversion of natural language questions into executable SQL queries. It leverages OpenAI's language models and includes features for automatic database schema detection, query validation, and error handling to streamline data interaction.

ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Unregistry is a tool that allows users to push Docker images directly to remote servers over SSH without needing an external container registry. It efficiently transfers only the missing image layers, acting like an 'rsync' for Docker images.
